original: Djurberg, Sten Ludvig, överstelöjtnant, Näs, Undenäs, f. 23/3/71 i Vist, östergötl. 1., av övering. Henning Aug. D. o. Hilda Ch. Wilhelmina Lundström. G. 96 m. Selma Thim-gren. Barn: Gösta f. 97, disp., Nils 99, off., Sten 02, off., Hans 04, jord-br :kons., Henning 06, banktj :man, Ludvig 09, konstnär, Signe 15. — Stud:ex. i Örebro 90, off:ex. 92. Und:-löjtn. v. Skarab. reg. 92, löjtn. 94, kapten 08, major v. Jönköp. reg. 16, öv:-löjtn. 36. Befälh. ö. Karlsborgs lo. 31-37. Slussinsp. v. Göta kanalv. 26-46. Artist (mål.). RSO, LandstSM, Jönk. 1. Ifb GM.
translated: Djurberg, Sten Ludvig, Lieutenant Colonel, Näs, Undenäs, b. March 23, 1871 in Vist, Östergötland, son of Lieutenant Colonel Henning Aug. D. and Hilda Ch. Wilhelmina Lundström. Married Selma Thimgren in 1896. Children: Gösta b. 1897, disployee; Nils b. 1899, officer; Sten b. 1902, officer; Hans b. 1904, farmer; Henning b. 1906, banker; Ludvig b. 1909, artist; Signe b. 1915. Passed high school exam in Örebro in 1890 and officer exam in 1892. Second Lieutenant in Skaraborg Regiment in 1892, Lieutenant in 1894, Captain in 1908, Major in Jönköping Regiment in 1916, Lieutenant Colonel in 1936. Commanding officer of Karlsborgs fortress from 1931 to 1937. Lock inspector of Göta Canal from 1926 to 1946. Also an artist (painter). Awarded the Royal Order of the Sword (RSO), Landstorm Medal, and Jönköping Medal of Merit.
